page.title: 14THE RECREATION GROUND
page.content: THE RECREATION GROUND IS USED BY ALL AGES.THERE IS A PLAY AREA FOR LITTLE CHILDREN AND A LARGER AREA FOR NON-ORGANISED SPORTS.MILTON HAS FACILITIES FOR FOOTBALL, CRICKET, TENNIS, NETBALL AND BADMINTON.THERE ARE PROVISIONS FOR SAILING, ROWING AND WATER SKI-ING.THE RIVER IS USED FOR PLEASURE CRAFT.THE YOUTH CLUB ORGANISES 5-A-SIDE FOOTBALL, POOL, TABLE TENNIS, SNOOKER AND DARTS. {(E)INDUSTRIAL:}THERE ARE THREE INDUSTRIAL ESTATES.THEY MANUFACTURE A VARIETY OF PRODUCTS RANGING FROM READY MIX CEMENT TO PAINT,WINDOWS, DOORS, MACHINERY REPAIRS, LASERS, SCIENTIFIC INSTRUMENTS, ETC.ONE OF THE MOST IMPORTANT IS BONDED METALS WHICH PRODUCE A LIGHT-WEIGHT STRONG METAL FOR PLANES,RACING CARS AND TRAINS.
